00026 int cimunit_thread_table_element_init(
00027   cimunit_thread_table_element_t *thread_table_element,
00028   cimunit_thread_t thread,
00029   const char *name)
00030 {
00031   thread_table_element->thread = thread;
00032   thread_table_element->name = name;
00033   thread_table_element->next = NULL;
00034   return 0;
00035 }

00041   //this is a no op for now...
00042   return 0;

00046 int cimunit_thread_table_init(cimunit_thread_table_t *thread_table){
00047   thread_table->head = NULL;
00048   return 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 int cimunit_thread_table_destroy(cimunit_thread_table_t *thread_table){
00053   cimunit_thread_table_element_t *next_element = thread_table->head;
00054   while(next_element != NULL){
00055     cimunit_thread_table_element_t *temp = next_element;  
00056     next_element  = next_element->next;
00057     cimunit_thread_table_element_destroy(temp);
00058     free(temp);
00059   }
00060   //Actually return something else if an error occurs
00061   return 0; 
00062 }
00063 
00064 int cimunit_find_thread_in_table(
00065   const cimunit_thread_table_t *thread_table,
00066   cimunit_thread_t thread,
00067   cimunit_thread_table_element_t **found_element)
00068 {
00069   cimunit_thread_table_element_t *current_element = thread_table->head;
00070 
00071   *found_element = NULL;
00072   while(current_element != NULL){
00073     if(current_element->thread == thread){
00074       *found_element = current_element;
00075        return 0;
00076     }
00077     else{
00078       current_element = current_element->next;
00079     }
00080   }
00081   return 0;
00082 }

00085 int cimunit_set_thread_name(
00086   cimunit_thread_table_t *thread_table,
00087   cimunit_thread_t thread,
00088   const char *name)
00089 {
00090   cimunit_thread_table_element_t *thread_table_element = NULL;
00091   cimunit_find_thread_in_table(thread_table, thread, &thread_table_element);
00092   if(thread_table_element == NULL){
00093     thread_table_element = (cimunit_thread_table_element_t*)malloc(
00094       sizeof(cimunit_thread_table_element_t));
00095     cimunit_thread_table_element_init(thread_table_element, thread, name);
00096     thread_table_element->next = thread_table->head;
00097     thread_table->head = thread_table_element;
00098   }
00099   else{
00100     thread_table_element->name = name;
00101   }
00102   //TODO actually return error code;
00103   return 0;
00104 }

00107 int cimunit_get_thread_name(
00108   const cimunit_thread_table_t *thread_table,
00109   cimunit_thread_t thread,
00110   const char **buf)
00111 {
00112   cimunit_thread_table_element_t *thread_table_element = NULL;
00113   cimunit_find_thread_in_table(thread_table, thread, &thread_table_element);
00114   if (thread_table_element)
00115   {
00116     *buf = thread_table_element->name;
00117   }
00118   return (thread_table_element != NULL);
00119 }
